turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hey there, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I was looking to order two small pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would u like on those 2 small pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Both of them pepperoni and extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total for 2 small pizzas, both with pepperoni and extra cheese is $25.66.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did u want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i've placed the order. it'll be ready for pick up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope. That'll be it for me. Thank you.
